.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkPhysicalDeviceImageFormatInfo2-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_PHYSICAL_DEVICE_IMAGE_FORMAT_INFO_2
* [[VUID-VkPhysicalDeviceImageFormatInfo2-pNext-pNext]] pname:pNext must: be `NULL` or a pointer to a valid instance of slink:VkPhysicalDeviceExternalImageFormatInfo
* [[VUID-VkPhysicalDeviceImageFormatInfo2-format-parameter]] pname:format must: be a valid elink:VkFormat value
* [[VUID-VkPhysicalDeviceImageFormatInfo2-type-parameter]] pname:type must: be a valid elink:VkImageType value
* [[VUID-VkPhysicalDeviceImageFormatInfo2-tiling-parameter]] pname:tiling must: be a valid elink:VkImageTiling value
* [[VUID-VkPhysicalDeviceImageFormatInfo2-usage-parameter]] pname:usage must: be a valid combination of elink:VkImageUsageFlagBits values
* [[VUID-VkPhysicalDeviceImageFormatInfo2-usage-requiredbitmask]] pname:usage must: not be `0`
* [[VUID-VkPhysicalDeviceImageFormatInfo2-flags-parameter]] pname:flags must: be a valid combination of elink:VkImageCreateFlagBits values
****
